name: Elvin
overview: An action flying game that was released as part of "Antics" game pack. Tired of the normal programming work, the Artgames team rummaged through the archive box again and discovered four slightly older, previously unreleased games. Since Elven is not only small and compact, but also a lot of fun to play, it was decided to it up to date by reprogramming and to publish it along with Chip-War, Mini-Boulder and Dulcedo Cogitations (Sweet thoughts) together in the Antics four pack. Digitized graphics and five harmonious sounds for four times the fun!
